column4: hi guys, I have a live CD with a lot of apps in there. I don't have a good internet connection right now, so dowloading apps is not an option for me. So I thought if I could extract the deb's from that live cd, but don't know how to do it. The "pool" is only 10 MB, So I guess everything is stored in filesystem.squashfs.  I extracted it, but don't know how to get debs from it.
There's a CD you can get that has many apps. Lemme find the name...
I have the CD  (Ubuntu ultimate edition. It has all the deb's but I don't know how to extract them. Plus I don't want to install it)
